name: Smoothy Box
description:
Live the Smoothy Box Life!
  1. Take orders
  2. Make Smoothies
  3. Get Paid!

Made in 3.5 Hours for Trijam 170

Controls - Basic FPS controls
  • Look with the mouse
  • Move with WASD
  • Left Click to interact with things
  • Tab to release mouse
